dialog.text: Sky covered by clouds completely and lower half by mountains. Sky completely dense and mountains are at different distances from the viewer
is the line between cloud and mountain flat
Not completely flat but horizontal. Hill needs to be drawn at the lower end near the center.  with very small amount of bushes
What's the curvature of the hills and where on the hills are the bushes located?
Draw hills on the left end of the screen in the shape of a quadrant but flatter and the bushes are at the lower right end
The upper 50%of the square is clouds, the lower 50% is mountains.  No water body visible
Does the hill go beyond the mountain?
The hills are the closest to you and only a small part of it is visible at the lower end.
What about the lighting? Is there sunlight? Is it nighttime?
Reduce the level of cloud on the lower side.
The mountains do not look alike. In terms of coloring, the bottom half should be completely covered with mountains except the area with the hills.
so there is no greens on the mountain just rocks?
Nothing on the mountain, the bush is only on the hills.
